cause.description:
We are a non-profit theatre located in the Hills of Habersham County, GA. We recently remodeled our theatre to bring out the feel of the movie theatre that it was back in the early days. This cost a lot of money and still more needs to be done. Please donate anything you can.
habershamtheater.org 706.839.1315 info@habershamtheater.org
1. Entertainment is an important part of life.
2. Anyone can stand on a stage and recite lines. It takes someone special to bring a character to life.
cause.mission: to bring live theatre and entertainment to the community through plays and musicals.
cause.name: Habersham Community Theatre
